type.name: ClientId
type.description: Represents the ID of a client application. The character set is restricted to a subset of ASN.1 PrintableString characters as defined in Appendix A of the specification.

constraint.description: Only the following characters are allowed: Latin capital letters (A-Z), Latin small letters (a-z), Digits (0-9), SPACE, APOSTROPHE ('), LEFT PARENTHESIS ((), RIGHT PARENTHESIS ()), PLUS SIGN (+), COMMA (,), HYPHEN-MINUS (-), FULL STOP (.), SOLIDUS (/), COLON (:), EQUALS SIGN (=), QUESTION MARK (?)

type.usage: Used in transaction log messages to identify the client application that initiated a transaction operation.
